mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chaos_shell ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, start_path TEXT NOT NULL, end_path TEXT NOT NULL, type INTEGER DEFAULT 0 CHECK (type BETWEEN 0 AND 9), -- 假设有4种故障类型 state INTEGER DEFAULT 0 CHECK (state IN (0, 1)), -- 0-未运行 1-运行中 java_home TEXT DEFAULT "", is_deleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0 CHECK (is_deleted IN (0, 1)) );
-- 删除语句 UPDATE chaos_shell SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE chaos_shell SET name = #{name}, start_path = #{startPath}, end_path = #{endPath}, type = #{type}, state = #{state}, java_home = #{javaHome} WHERE id = #{id};
